sentence.text: However, there is limited knowledge on the selenoprotein expression in colorectal adenoma (RNA splicing) and colorectal cancer (CRC) patients, or the interaction with Se status levels.

While there were no significant correlations with both Se status markers, SELENOF, SELENOK, and TXNRD1 tumor tissue expression positively correlated with Se, while TXNRD2 and TXNRD3 negatively correlated with platelet degranulation.
